snippet.title: Haunted Space - Official Gameplay Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2021
snippet.description:
This spooky space combat game bends sci-fi and horror in a story-rich adventure based on exploration, fast-paced dogfighting, trading, and ship crafting. Do you have what it takes to defeat the ancient god-like creatures that haunt space?

#IGN #Gaming #SummerOfGaming
